Reviews.Title: Should not to be sold.
Reviews.Author: WSC
Reviews.Content: This product is really almost Garbage. The gray level was changing by itself, and blue noise spots on all over the screen

Reviews.Title: Good for price
Reviews.Author: liz foster
Reviews.Content: Ordered it to replace one that went out. Works very well in day or night. Picture was clear. Good price.

Reviews.Title: good item
Reviews.Author: Terrell Deshotel
Reviews.Content: I have other 420 tvl camera's with 36pcs IR LEDs and this camera has better picture and better night picture. I order 2 to replace some camera's and I am order 2 more to replace to more, not because they are broke. Because this camera is a better picture. I would recommend.

ProductInfo.Features:
IP66 Waterproof Level Work Indoor / Outdoor, No Audio, 6mm Lens for Wide View Angle, BNC Connection, DC 12V Regulated Power Supply.
Image Sensor: 1/3 Inch Sony CCD Sensor,CDS Sensor. Horizontal Resolution: 420 TVL. Signal System: NTSC. Effective Pixels:512(H) x 492(V).
The Distributed 5mm Diametrical 850nm Wavelength 36 Pcs Infrared LEDs, Makes It Have Good Night Vision Up to 60 - 90 Feet.
Black Color Housing, Auto White Balance, Internal Sync Speed, Backlight Compensation.
This CCTV Security Camera Can Be Used As One Component of Surveillance Systems in House, Hotel, Large Square, Road, etc. Various Occasions.
ProductInfo.Name: Black 36pcs IR LEDs Night Vision 1/3" Sony CCD CDS Digital Video Security Camera with 420 TV Lines, IP66 Waterproof Level, 6mm Lens, For Indoor / Outdoor Security Surveillance
